alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Jones; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:08PM EDT until August 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Baldwin County in central Georgia... Southern Putnam County in central Georgia... Northeastern Jones County in central Georgia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 708 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Browns Crossing, or 7 miles west of Milledgeville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Eatonton, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether, Ethridge, Allenwood, Haddock, Resseaus Crossroads, Warfield, Plant Harlee Branch, Hardwick, Browns Crossing, Stanfordville and Blountsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
